The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 07 August is 59,206 (6,823.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 02 August, there were 2,275 new confirmed cases (262.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 July, there were 2,372 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (97 fewer cases).
